text: Yego serdtse szhalos' ot togo, chto rasskazali synov'ya, i on, otvernuvshis' ot nikh, ostalsya nayedine s samim soboy, ispytyvaya takuyu pechal' i skorb' iz-za togo, chto poteryal Yusufa, chto yego glaza sovsem vytsveli i stali belesymi, poteryav tsvet i ostrotu zreniya. On yele sderzhival svoy gnev i pechal'
